file.name: websocket-api.yaml
file.content:
apiVersion: gateway.kusk.io/v1alpha1
kind: API
metadata:
  name: ws-server
spec:
  # service name and port should be specified inside x-kusk annotation
  spec: |
    openapi: 3.0.0
    info:
      title: Websocket test
      version: 1.0.0
    x-kusk:
      hosts: [ "localhost", "*"]
      # Enable websocket globally
      websocket: true
      upstream:
        service:
          namespace: default
          name: ws-server
          port: 80
    paths:
      /apiwebsocket:
        get:
          responses:
            '200':
              description: ''
              content:
                application/json:
                  schema:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      test:
                        type: string
                        description: Description of test endpoint
                    # required:
                    #   - test
            '400':
              description: Client error
              content:
                application/json:
                  schema:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/endpoints.Errors'
            '500':
              description: Server error
              content:
                application/json:
                  schema:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/endpoints.Errors'
      /disabledapiwebsocket:
        x-kusk:
          websocket: false
        get:
          responses:
            '200':
              description: ''
              content:
                application/json:
                  schema:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      test:
                        type: string
                        description: Description of test endpoint
                    # required:
                    #   - test
            '400':
              description: Client error
              content:
                application/json:
                  schema:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/endpoints.Errors'
            '500':
              description: Server error
              content:
                application/json:
                  schema:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/endpoints.Errors'
          summary: Test websocket
    components:
      schemas:
        endpoints.Errors:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
